703024f-a.text:
(1) Atlantic Ave., northside, at and adjoining Bond Street. Also seen is Bond Street, east side, adjoining and north of Atlantic Ave. The view shows the Second United Presbyterian Church. January 26, 1930.

P.L. Sperr.

(2) The same, from a different angle. January 26, 1930.

P.L. Sperr.
703024f-a.folder: Atlantic Avenue & Bond Street, Brooklyn, NY

703025f-a.text:
Atlantic Ave., north side, from and including Bond, to, but not including Nevins Streets, showing a view of the Swedish Evangelic Pilgrim Church.

January 26, 1930.

P.L. Sperr.
